DOC.criteria: Case group : Women hospitalize preeclampsia 20 0/7 week gestation . The diagnosis preeclampsia include combination follow criterion : 20 week pregnancy previously normotensive woman , diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg record twice least four hour apart ≥ 110 mmHg , proteinuria ≥ 300 mg/24h ≥ 30 mg / mmol protein / urinary creatinine urine sample factor ( ) serious maternal / fetal ( accord consensus SOGC ) . Control group : Women match woman preeclampsia accord gestational age diagnosis preeclampsia , maternal age ( stratum 5 year ) , gender , ethnicity ( 4 category : Caucasian , black , Asian ) body mass index ( 5 class : < 20 , 2025 , 2630 , 3135 < 35 ) .
